posts.post_content:
For sale is a beautiful oak storage box for T206's. Box measures 9"X13"X4". The bottom has green felt so box can be displayed anywhere without leaving scatches. Inside of box also has green felt on the bottom as well as 4 divider panels creating 5 rows of card storage. Outside of box has brass hinges and is lockable with key. A really nice way to store and display your T206 collection. $100 net to me plus $20 for shipping.

Thanks for looking.

[url=https://postimages.org/][img]https://i.postimg.cc/hjSjmhBh/top.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://postimages.org/][img]https://i.postimg.cc/MTdGmx65/open.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://postimages.org/][img]https://i.postimg.cc/4NK3Vrrv/front.jpg[/img][/url]

What slabs (if any) will fit or is it built to accommodate Top Loaders only?

Thanks

The dividers can be removed so technically you could store slabs horizonally in the box but only a very limited number would fit. The box is designed with the divider panels to hold raw tobacco cards in tobacco card size plastic sleeves. I've added a picture to show how the sleeves fit in the rows, i will include the sleeves (30) with the box. Hope this answers your question.

Thanks.

[url=https://postimages.org/][img]https://i.postimg.cc/LXZQFk5Z/slabs.jpg[/img][/url]
How many cards will the box holdl? Thanks!
These are designed to hold 525 tobacco sized top loaders.
Box is in brand new shape. Reduced to $85 net to me plus $20 for shipping.

Beautiful box at a great price!  These are perfect with 525 top loaders!

(dakotawoodcrafts.com)
Thanks!  I missed on this one, and was trying to find where it came from...
I've got the slabbed storage box from the same site and it's really really nice.
